           shared_ptr[COutputStream] sink

fields.description: Currently the ORC writer doesn't support io.BytesIO. We need to figure out why that's the case and provide the needed support.
fields.summary: [Python] io.BytesIO support for the ORC writer

comments.body:
def test_bytesio_readwrite():
    from pyarrow import orc
    from io import BytesIO
 
    bytesio = BytesIO()
    a = pa.array([1, None, 3, None])
    b = pa.array([None, "Arrow", None, "ORC"])
    table = pa.table(\{"int64": a, "utf8": b})
    orc.write_table(table, bytesio)
    orc_file = orc.ORCFile(bytesio.getvalue())
    output_table = orc_file.read()
    assert table.equals(output_table)

This test results in an error since bytesio is closed.
I will really appreciate it if this is merged ASAP since it affects https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/pull/44554
